name: Shoot the Cans (VR)
description:
The game, which will become a drug for you! Exciting levels, unpredictable designs, incredible obstacles await you in Shoot the Cans!

Find out how much you are accurate in a virtual reality. Great graphics and realistic physics will immerse you into the world of Shoot the Cans. You will not leave until you will pass all the levels with 3 stars!

Soak yourself in game!

Requires VR glasses (headset) FIBRUM (or cardboard). It's compartible with different virtual reality headsets (also known as hmd) such as Google Cardboard or Homido.
